definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: town in Simeon ´[[מוֹל]] Jos 19:2 = 1Ch 28; inhabited after exile Ne 11:26; name occurs also Jos 15:26 (where prob. interpol. from Ne 11:26 v. Di); LXX Mwlada, etc.; identified by Rob:BR ii, 201 Guêrin:Judêe iii, 184 ff. with Tel Tilḥ, 4 hours E. from Beersheba = Malaqa Jos:Ant. xviii. 6, 2; Mala(a)qwn, Malatha Lag:Onom. 214. 266. 87. 119, v. also Di
